TEXT.TITLE: BARLEY SOLD TO SAUDI ARABIA - USDA
TEXT.BODY: Private exporters reported sales of 150,000 tonnes of barley to Saudi Arabia for delivery in the 1987/88 season, the U.S. Agriculture Deapartment said. The 1987/88 season for barley begins today. Reuter
